(Icedemon, you posted that your shot exploded and formed a bubble around me, 
that is moding.  You had Rattrap fire two shots, and then 25 rapid shots.  
That is a total of 27 shots, two shots over the limit)

Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Shockwave/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh
Ripper/Streetwise/Groove:



Unicron saw a bolt coming, and fired off two optic blasts before it was 
several feet away from Angel Prime.  Flying up quickly, he avoided most of 
the shots fired on him but two plasma charges hit him square in the chest 
knocking him back a foot in mid air, the robot only laughing.

He fired off five rapid optic blasts at Rattrap and raised both arms, 
launching an energy-signature seeking missile at Starwind from one, and a 
missile of the same type at Angel Prime.

---

Vehement dodged the EMP blasts and a missile, the other exploding against his 
chest armor but not piercing it.  He sighed as his chest singed painfully, 
raising an arm and launching an energy-signature seeking missile at Killfest, 
followed by a single optic blast.

---

Sun Crusher gained altitude rapidly, escaping two missiles, the ion disks, 
and the fireballs, two optic blasts intercepting one missile, the other 
knocking Sun Crusher backwards in the air a few feet.  He raised a wrist, the 
cannon attached to it firin three fusion blasts at Greven.

---

Reflector watched Endbringer land and jump into the air in Reflector's 
direction, but didn't even get close since Reflector was around a hundred 
feet up.  

"These heathens grow dumber by the day." he laughed, raising a wrist and 
firing down two missiles at the Predacon scum.

---

Demon Wulf almost fell because of Streetwise's precise shots, but he growled 
and fired off three optic blasts at the Maximal's sternum.

---

Flesh Ripper felt the blasts strike and laughed at Groove, forming an orb of 
energy in his left palm with the equal power of a grenade and throwing it at 
him.

---

Dark Claw felt a fireball strike him, but in his heavily armored mode it 
didn't do any harsh damage.  He launched four missiles off at the CF.

---

Streetwise yelled out, the grenade-like orb sending him flying back in the 
air and crashing to his back, a small hole in his cheset armor.  He coughed 
up some mech-fluid and began gathering strength to get up, until the rapid 
blasts from Shockwave pierced into his already wounded chest.  Getting up 
wasn't on his mind for now.

---

The force of the optic blasts twirled Groove, who let out a sigh of anger and 
ducked down, firing of two photon blasts at Demon Wulf's right knee joint, 
and three optic blasts up at Shockwave.

---

Shockwave rolled in the air, avoiding the laser blasts, and launched two 
missiles down at the Cybertronian Fire, soon followed by twenty-five rapid 
laser blasts.
